## Foramen Ovale

Trigeminal motor root exits the skull via the [foramen ovale]({{< var ref-foramen-ovale-sphenoid-bone.path >}})

## Meckel's cave
The motor root of trigeminal nerve enters a cavity in the dura mater overlying the apex of the petrous bone (Meckel cave) @brazisLocalizationClinicalNeurology2022
